# The `api_pred_ty` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This helper class is used to match scalar and vector constants that satisfy a specified predicate, and bind them to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename Predicate&gt;
struct llvm::PatternMatch::api_pred_ty&lt;Predicate&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This helper class is used to match scalar and vector constants that satisfy a specified predicate, and bind them to an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>.
